```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(haven)

soe <- read_dta("FHS 2154 - datasets/dr281_vr_soe_2016_a_1073s.dta")
all_data <- read_sas('alldata2022.sas7bdat copy')
survdth <- read_dta("FHS 2154 - datasets/dr281_vr_survdth_2014_a_1025s.dta")
```

```{r}
all_data2 <- all_data %>% 
  inner_join(soe, by = c("IDTYPE", "ranid")) %>% 
  inner_join(survdth, by = c("IDTYPE", "ranid"))
```
